description: It eventually became policy for Labrynnian generals to have some training in applying medicines and potions to their own injuries. Brigadas came to carry a small emergency kit full of healing liquids and bandages to help them recover in between skirmishes.

Brigadas came to carry a small emergency kit full of healing liquids and bandages to help them recover in between skirmishes. (Brigada now regenerate HP while idle)
